name: My First Songs
overview: My First Songs is a karaoke game, similar to the Singstar series, targeting the young kids. It contains 20 renowned kids songs. Every song has its original cartoon video clip telling the story of the song. The game is sold as bundle version with a microphone or as software only. The game contains 2 game modes: Solo / Duo mode with musics and vocals for the kids discovering a song. Solo / Duo mode with musics and no vocal for the kids wanting to sing alone as an adult. For each language, the game has a different playlist.
